## Private Member Functions

### collectSeedInstructions() {#a95587440624104bf0dcf1ec49c9e5dd9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void SLPVectorizerPass::collectSeedInstructions (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB)</>}>
Collect store and getelementptr instructions and organize them according to the underlying object of their pointer operands.

We sort the instructions by their underlying objects to reduce the cost of consecutive access queries.

TODO: We can further reduce this cost if we flush the chain creation every time we run into a memory barrier.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/slpvectorizer-h/#l00092">92</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/slpvectorizer-h">SLPVectorizer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/slpvectorizer-cpp/#l19121">19121</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/slpvectorizer-cpp">SLPVectorizer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### vectorizeChainsInBlock() {#ab861e110516b49b2a0b0a8fd0eaba945}

### vectorizeHorReduction() {#ad09a6704349e3bed07711e2d7c43d29c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool SLPVectorizerPass::vectorizeHorReduction (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42; P, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; Root, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slpvectorizer/boupslp">slpvectorizer::BoUpSLP</a> &amp; R, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/weaktrackingvh">WeakTrackingVH</a> &gt; &amp; PostponedInsts)</>}>
Try to find horizontal reduction or otherwise, collect instructions for postponed vectorization attempts.

<em>P</em> if not null designates phi node the reduction is fed into (with reduction operators <em>Root</em> or one of its operands, in a basic block <em>BB</em>). 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
true if a horizontal reduction was matched and reduced.
</SectionUser>


<SectionUser title="Returns">
false if <em>V</em> is null or not an instruction, or a horizontal reduction was not matched or not possible.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/slpvectorizer-h/#l00123">123</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/slpvectorizer-h">SLPVectorizer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/slpvectorizer-cpp/#l21043">21043</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/slpvectorizer-cpp">SLPVectorizer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
